import { useEffect, Fragment } from "react"; import Head from 'next/head'; const JobDetailsPage = ({ id, data }) => { useEffect(() => { if (id) { const history = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('broswedJob') || '[]'); const updatedHistory = history.concat(id); localStorage.setItem('broswedJob', JSON.stringify(updatedHistory)) } }, [id]) return {data ? ( {data.title}
{data.title}

This is the share buttons

Company : {data.company}

Description: {data.description}

How to apply

) : (
Loading...
)} } export default JobDetailsPage
